verses.verse: Now the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H3898>fought<s%> against <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: and the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5127>fled<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>, and fell <S%H5307>down<s%> <S%H2491>slain<s%> in <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H1533>Gilboa<s%>.

And the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> followed <S%H1692>hard<s%> upon <S%H7586>Saul<s%> and upon his <S%H1121>sons<s%>; and the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H5221>slew<s%> <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%>, and <S%H41>Abinadab<s%>, and <S%H4444>Malchi-shua<s%>, the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%>.

And the <S%H4421>battle<s%> went <S%H3513>sore<s%> against <S%H7586>Saul<s%>, and the <S%H582>archers<s%> <S%H4672>overtook<s%> <S%H3966>him<s%>; and he was greatly <S%H2342>distressed<s%> by reason of the <S%H582>archers<s%>.

Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> to his <S%H5375>armorbearer<s%>, <S%H8025>Draw<s%> thy <S%H2719>sword<s%>, and thrust me <S%H1856>through<s%> <S%H6189>therewith<s%>, lest these uncircumcised <S%H935>come<s%> and thrust me <S%H1856>through<s%>, and <S%H5953>abuse<s%> <S%H5375>me<s%>. But his armorbearer <S%H14>would<s%> <S%H3966>not<s%>; for he was sore <S%H3372>afraid<s%>. Therefore <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> his <S%H2719>sword<s%>, and fell upon <S%H5307>it<s%>.
And when his <S%H5375>armorbearer<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that <S%H7586>Saul<s%> was <S%H4191>dead<s%>, he likewise <S%H5307>fell<s%> upon his <S%H2719>sword<s%>, and died with <S%H4191>him<s%>.
So <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%>, and his <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%>, and his <S%H5375>armorbearer<s%>, and all his <S%H582>men<s%>, that same <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%>.

And when the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> that were on the other <S%H5676>side<s%> of the <S%H6010>valley<s%>, and they that were <S%H5676>beyond<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>, <S%H7200>saw<s%> that the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5127>fled<s%>, and that <S%H7586>Saul<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> were <S%H4191>dead<s%>, they <S%H5800>forsook<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%>, and <S%H5127>fled<s%>; and the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> and dwelt in <S%H3427>them<s%>.

And it came to pass on the <S%H4283>morrow<s%>, when the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H6584>strip<s%> the <S%H2491>slain<s%>, that they <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> and his <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H5307>fallen<s%> in <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H1533>Gilboa<s%>.

And they cut <S%H3772>off<s%> his <S%H7218>head<s%>, and stripped <S%H6584>off<s%> his <S%H3627>armor<s%>, and <S%H7971>sent<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>, to carry the <S%H1319>tidings<s%> unto the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H6091>idols<s%>, and to the <S%H5971>people<s%>.

And they <S%H7760>put<s%> his <S%H3627>armor<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H6252>Ashtaroth<s%>; and they <S%H8628>fastened<s%> his <S%H1472>body<s%> to the <S%H2346>wall<s%> of <S%H1052>Beth-shan<s%>.
And when the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3003>Jabesh-gilead<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> concerning him that which the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> had <S%H6213>done<s%> to <S%H7586>Saul<s%>,

all the <S%H2428>valiant<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H6965>arose<s%>, and <S%H3212>went<s%> all <S%H3915>night<s%>, and <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H1472>body<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%> and the <S%H1472>bodies<s%> of his <S%H1121>sons<s%> from the <S%H2346>wall<s%> of <S%H1052>Beth-shan<s%>; and they <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H3003>Jabesh<s%>, and burnt them <S%H8313>there<s%>.

And they <S%H3947>took<s%> their <S%H6106>bones<s%>, and <S%H6912>buried<s%> them under the <S%H815>tamarisk-tree<s%> in <S%H3003>Jabesh<s%>, and <S%H6684>fasted<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>.
